Message: Hi Valiwe, apologies for the delayed response and pending ads. As you're account was new it was still undergoing business verification process before being approved to go live.
Happy to inform you that your account and ads have been approved and should start delivering shortly. Thank you
hey andrew, thanks for your reply! I still see them pending and not approved? I hope that changes soon =)
Apologies about that, confirming they have been approved. Thank you
